explains: n. 补足物，衬托物；足数，足额；补语；余角；补体，防御素
wordGroup: complement activation 补体激活；补体的激活
object complement 宾语补足语；宾补

sentences.en: There will be a written examination to complement the practical test.
sentences.cn: 会有一次书面考试来补充实践测试。

sentences.en: The therapy can be a useful technique to complement traditional forms of psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 这种疗法可以作为一个有效的技巧，作为传统心理疗法的补充。

sentences.en: Be cautious that complement should be genuine & unique to the person and it mostly never be unheard off.
sentences.cn: 要小心，这种补助应该是真诚的，对那个人来说是独一无二的，而且大多数情况下都不会被忽视。
